name: Outlook web mail, mark unread.
description: Makes unread mails in the latest Outlook Web more visible.
additional_info: The latest update to Outlook makes the Inbox a bit confusing when separating read/unread mails. Sure, you can pick another theme and get the sender name in bold, but when you're as lazy as me you might want the whole subject line clearly marked. Lots of people have complained about this, so it'll probably be fixed soon, but for now:
